/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/:
The image captures a bustling construction site in the heart of Beijing, China. Dominating the scene is a towering building under construction, its skeletal structure reaching towards the clear blue sky. A crane, a testament to the ongoing work, stands tall on the right side of the image. The building itself is enveloped in scaffolding, hinting at the intricate process of construction.

The street on which the construction site is located is lined with lush green trees, adding a touch of nature to the urban landscape. Power lines crisscross above, a common sight in many cityscapes. On the left side of the image, a white car is parked, perhaps belonging to one of the workers or passersby.

The perspective of the image is particularly striking. Taken from a low angle, it emphasizes the height of the building and the crane, making them appear even more imposing. This perspective also gives a sense of being in the midst of the action, as if one could step forward and join the construction crew.

Despite the absence of people in the image, the presence of the crane and scaffolding suggest a hive of activity just out of frame. The image is a snapshot of progress, a moment frozen in time amidst the constant evolution of Beijing's skyline.
